fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Light of Foliar Incision__ - His BiS weapon, a amazing stat stick along with full utilization of it's passive, provide CRIT and DMG bonuses
__Primordial Jade Cutter__ - A great stat stick, the attack is a added benefit

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Harbinger of Dawn__ - A weapon with a amazing passive if able to maintained, almost always requiring a shielder.
__Festering Desire__ - A decent passive that benifits his kit 
__Black Sword__ A decent stat stick with a alright passive

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> Elemental Mastery|<goblet> Dendro DMG bonus|<circlet> CRIT DMG or Rate

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Skill: An Elaboration on Form
**2)** Normal Attack: Abductive Reasoning
**3)** Elemental Burst: Fetters of Phenomena

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value: Mistplitter Reforged outscales Primordial Jade Cutter at above refinement 3
